name: ShhhuntCurriculumLearning
setup: ThirdPersonController-based Shhhunt arena wired for a four-phase curriculum. Trainer-driven environment parameter shhhunt_curriculum_stage toggles EnvironmentManager to sequentially reveal obstacles and structures while the TargetPositioner controls when the target may perch on geometry.
goal: Reach the glowing target in under 60 seconds no matter which curriculum phase is active, demonstrating stable locomotion before mastering obstacle climbs and elevated placements.

agents.description: Single humanoid agent driven by ThirdPersonControllerAdapter. Additional clones can share the same policy to improve throughput but still follow the shared curriculum stage.

terms: +1.0 base reward plus up to +0.5 time bonus when the agent touches the target within the phase time window.
Dense shaping: distanceDelta * distanceRewardScale provides incremental credit for closing the gap every step.
timePenalty (negative) applied each DecisionStep to encourage finishing well before the 60 s cutoff.
+successfulJumpReward (0.05) when a grounded jump successfully lifts off; invalid jump requests incur invalidJumpPenalty.
obstacleCollisionPenalty hit whenever the CharacterController collides with tagged obstacles or structures.
Overtime penalty (−0.5) if the agent exceeds maxEpisodeSeconds without success.
−1.0 when falling below fallThreshold or moving beyond maxDistanceFromTarget without progress.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: 15 floats identical to the obstacle baseline: normalized target offset (3), normalized velocity (3), sin(yaw), normalized scalar distance, local target dir X/Z, grounded flag, normalized vertical velocity, normalized jump cooldown, and phase-aware booleans for target-on-obstacle and sprinting. RayPerception sensors (Obstacle/Ground/Target tags) are still recommended for spatial awareness.
behavior_parameters.actions: 5 continuous actions mapped to ThirdPersonControllerAdapter: forward/back, left/right, reserved slot, sprint toggle, jump signal (thresholded).
behavior_parameters.visual_observations: Not required; curriculum feedback is delivered via EnvironmentManager state and the vector observations.

float_properties.name: targetReachedThreshold
float_properties.description: Distance threshold counted as reaching the target.

float_properties.name: fallThreshold
float_properties.description: Y level treated as falling off the arena.

float_properties.name: maxDistanceFromTarget
float_properties.description: Max distance allowed before failure.

float_properties.name: maxDistance
float_properties.description: Normalization range for relative position and scalar distance.

float_properties.name: maxSpeed
float_properties.description: Horizontal speed used to normalize velocity observations.

float_properties.name: verticalVelocityNormalization
float_properties.description: Magnitude cap for vertical velocity normalization.

float_properties.name: distanceRewardScale
float_properties.description: Scale for distance-based shaping reward.

float_properties.name: timePenalty
float_properties.description: Negative per-step penalty encouraging efficiency.

float_properties.name: successfulJumpReward
float_properties.description: Reward when a grounded jump successfully lifts off.

float_properties.name: invalidJumpPenalty
float_properties.description: Penalty for invalid jump requests (airborne/cooldown).

float_properties.name: obstacleCollisionPenalty
float_properties.description: Penalty applied on obstacle or structure collisions.

float_properties.name: targetOnObstacleYOffset
float_properties.description: Height offset when target spawns on an obstacle.

float_properties.name: targetGroundYOffset
float_properties.description: Height offset when target spawns on flat ground.

float_properties.name: spawnAreaSizeX
float_properties.description: Width of the spawn area along X.

float_properties.name: spawnAreaSizeZ
float_properties.description: Width of the spawn area along Z.

float_properties.name: spawnRetries
float_properties.description: Attempts to find a non-overlapping spawn point.

float_properties.name: spawnClearanceRadius
float_properties.description: Radius checked to avoid spawning inside obstacles.

float_properties.name: agentSpawnYOffset
float_properties.description: Extra height applied to agent spawn positions.

float_properties.name: sprintActionThreshold
float_properties.description: Action magnitude required to toggle sprint.

float_properties.name: jumpActionThreshold
float_properties.description: Action magnitude required to request a jump.

float_properties.name: jumpCooldownSeconds
float_properties.description: Cooldown between successful jumps.

float_properties.name: maxEpisodeSeconds
float_properties.description: Hard time limit applied per episode before applying overtime penalties.
